name: Lucid dream-RUN
description:
This game is just a game made for practice.

explanation

Goal: Find 3 energy chargers hidden throughout the map within the time limit and recharge your energy to move on to the next level.

control key

Computer: A, D key to change direction, space key to jump, lookback key to look back

Mobile: Operate using the touchpad

Purple Sphere: Slows on contact.

Moving Stone: If a player comes within line of sight, it will chase and start knocking them back.

Large moving stone: Doesn't normally push back, but when using the energy charger in the place you guard, it pushes back so that you can't charge energy.
